mapper.insert: insert into `gs_goods_sn` (id, create_time, update_time, create_by, update_by, delete_flag, sn, goods_id, location_id, `status`, wh_id, in_time, out_time, prd_date, groud_status ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{sn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{locationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{whId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{inTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{outTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{prdDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{groudStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT} )

create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update `gs_goods_sn` set create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, delete_flag = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, sn = #{sn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, location_id = #{locationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, wh_id = #{whId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, in_time = #{inTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, out_time = #{outTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, prd_date = #{prdDate,jdbcType=DATE}, groud_status = #{groudStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT sn.id,sn.goods_id,sn.location_id,sn.wh_id, sn.sn,la.CBLA09,pb.CBPB10,pb.CBPB12,pb.CBPB08 FROM `gs_goods_sn` sn left join CBPB pb on pb.CBPB01 = sn.goods_id left join CBLA la on la.CBLA01 = sn.location_id WHERE sn.goods_id = #{goodsId} AND sn.wh_id = #{whId} AND sn.groud_status=1 AND sn.status=1 ORDER BY sn.create_time desc

SELECT sn.id,sn.goods_id,sn.location_id,sn.wh_id, sn.sn,la.CBLA09,pb.CBPB10,pb.CBPB12,pb.CBPB08 FROM `gs_goods_sn` sn left join CBPB pb on pb.CBPB01 = sn.goods_id left join CBLA la on la.CBLA01 = sn.location_id WHERE sn.delete_flag =0 or sn.delete_flag is null ORDER BY sn.create_time desc

SELECT pk.CBPK01 as id, pk.CBPK07 as orderNo, pk.CBPK30 as customerNo, ca.CBCA08 as customerName, ca.CBCA28 as customerLevel, pk.CBPK18 as contacts, pk.CBPK19 as phone, us.nick_name as saleUser, wa.CBWA09 as whName, pk.CBPK21 as address, pk.CBPK08 as orderDate, pk.CBPK11 as status, pk.check_status as checkStatus
FROM `CBPK` pk LEFT JOIN CBCA as ca on ca.CBCA01=pk.CBPK09 LEFT JOIN sys_user us on us.user_id=pk.CBPK17 LEFT JOIN CBWA wa on wa.CBWA01=pk.CBPK10 where pk.CBPK06=0 and pk.check_status=1
and pk.CBPK07 like concat('%', #{orderNo}, '%')
and date_format(pk.CBPK08,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{params.beginTime},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(pk.CBPK08,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{params.endTime},'%y%m%d')
and ca.CBCA08 like concat('%', #{customerName}, '%')
and pk.CBPK11 =#{status}
and wa.CBWA09 like concat('%', #{whName}, '%')
and pk.sale_order_no like concat('%', #{saleOrderNo}, '%')
